official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide technical assistance for streambank failure and erosion control.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide technical assistance for streambank failure retardation and erosion control. Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act through FY 1988.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide technical assistance for streambank failure and erosion control.
